Class minimud.mudobject 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----minimud.mudobject
public class mudobject
extends Object
The basic class for all the objects on the MiniMUD. These are set-up when loaded when the MUD initialises.

keyword
Keyword which the user uses to refer to the object.
location
Where the object is located
room_description
Description displayed to the user when in the room

mudobject(String, String, int)
Standard constructor to create a mud object

getKeyword()
Return the object's keyword
getLocation()
Return the object's location number
getRoom_desc()
Return the object's room description
setLocation(int)
Set the location number of the object

keyword 
 protected String keyword
Keyword which the user uses to refer to the object.

room_description 
 protected String room_description
Description displayed to the user when in the room

location 
 protected int location
Where the object is located

mudobject 
 public mudobject(String k,
                  String r_d,
                  int l)
Standard constructor to create a mud object

getKeyword 
 public String getKeyword()
Return the object's keyword

getRoom_desc 
 public String getRoom_desc()
Return the object's room description

getLocation 
 public int getLocation()
Return the object's location number

setLocation 
 public void setLocation(int l)
Set the location number of the object
